itemDescription: Scottish footballer who played for Linthouse, Partick Thistle, Blackburn Rovers, Rangers, West Ham United, Hibernian and the Scotland national team (1877-1919)

wikipedia_page.main: John William Campbell (2 October 1877 – 20 January 1919) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Linthouse, Partick Thistle, Blackburn Rovers, Rangers, West Ham United, Hibernian and the Scotland national team.
